text: Giovanni Conti (born 25 September 1960) is a Sammarinese windsurfer. He competed in the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – Division II Category:Olympic sailors of San Marino Category:Sammarinese male sailors (sport) Category:Sammarinese windsurfers
title: Giovanni Conti (windsurfer)
